long_description: For strolling city streets or snowshoeing through the forest, the REI Quilted Cabbie hat will keep your head warm while adding a touch of style to your outfit. Polyester satin headband is soft and comfortable next to skin. Elastic in back adds some adjustability in size.
short_description: For strolling city streets or snowshoeing through the forest, the REI Quilted Cabbie hat will keep your head warm while adding a touch of style to your outfit.
